name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell
synopsis: Infiltrate terrorists' positions, acquire critical intelligence by any means necessary, execute with extreme prejudice, and exit without a trace.  In Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell, you are Sam Fisher, a highly trained secret operative of the NSA's secret arm: Third Echelon.  Suit up with the latest classified field operative gear and weapons as you travel through diverse mission objectives.  The world's future is in your hands, as cyber terrorism and international tensions are about to explode into WWIII.
